text: 'Good-bye, Sandra, he said with a deadly finality. Watching him go, unable to speak, she felt that part of her was leaving with him. She couldn't hate him... If only he would have confided in her, given some explanation. Now there was nothing - not even friendship.
handwritten_text: 'Good-bye, Sandra, he said with a deadly finality. Watching him go, unable to speak, she felt that part of her was leaving with him. She couldn't hate him... If only he would have confided in her, given some explanation. Now there was nothing - not even friendship.
